text:
@WhiteHouse reopening safely?

YOU WANT TO REOPEN SAFELY?
OFFER A FEDERAL COVID-19 TEST FOR FREE !!
EVERYWHERE, EVERY DAY!!

EVERY AMERICAN STUDENT OR WORKER
SHOULD BE ABLE TO GET A COVID-19 TEST FOR FREE NATIONWIDE.

States are responsible for testing
But you are not FUNDING FOR TESTING
